thumb.title: [OneShot "Children of the Ruins" Remix]Skipping Through Ruins
thumb.description: 以前頒布したCDに収録した「Children of the Ruins」のアレンジとなります。This is an arrangement of "Children of the Ruins," which was included on a previously released CD.サイト↓https://oecusoundserver.github.io/Cadence/event/CAD-0009.html無断転載禁止/Unauthorized Reproduction ProhibitedTitle：Skipping Through Ruinsremixed by さくらもちillust：さくらもちOriginal：OneShot "Children of the Ruins"Twitter：さくらもち( https://twitter.com/mixtuti_mochi )その他色々手伝ってくれた人 クロカビ( https://twitter.com/klokirb )Discord：https://discord.gg/n3zNdZF4mX
